title: GORGEOUS SUMMERLIN PROPERTIES
posting_body: AMAZING LUXURY HOMES AVAILABLE FOR RENT IN THE HIGHLY DESIRABLE SUMMERLIN COMMUNITY.
CENTRAL LOCATION CLOSE TO SHOPPING, DOWNTOWN SUMMERLIN, HOME OF THE AVIATORS, AND MORE.
FULL OF UPGRADES FEATURING STAINLESS STEEL APPLIANCES, NEW FLOORING, NEW PAINT AND MUCH MORE!!
FULLY FURNISHED PROPERTIES AVAILABLE WITH HIGH END FURNISHINGS.
HURRY, THESE HOMES WON'T LAST LONG!!
FOR MORE INFORMATION OR TO APPLY
